name: Green Ring
short_description: A light weight form that combines comfort, an outlet as an environmental portal with multi-purpose utilities results in prospective scope of consumers that is quite vast. The design model calls for contributors to assist in applying existing technology & an upcoming wave of the future for a patent pending model. Copyright by United Pathos. Colleagues must sign NDA for consideration. Environmental & Civil Engineers are needed. I seek input on a broad scale to work with a maximum of 5-7 individuals. Contact homepage or see Blog site : Gnatspace.wordpress.com / call me for inquiries at (830) 237.9477 or (713) 385.1985 mobile numbers & leave a message if I am inaccessible at the time. I will return the message within 24-72 hours. This design calls for a preliminary & final NDA. The final Non-disclosure Agreement is intended to mention the collaborative efforts of those involved & their names for recognition purposes. Proceed with research of NASA Aerogel for future reference & overview.
summary: Multi-purpose, innovative & environmental use of technologies
